availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A Kentucky-born farmer. Lived in Edmonson County (Brownsville post office), Kentucky. Married Mary Rachel Logsdon.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Edmonson County, Brownsville post office, p. 8.

Find A Grave, Entry for William Richard Durbin (1811-1890), Find A Grave Memorial # 99226931, Saint John the Evangelist Catholic Church Cemetery, Sunfish, Edmonson County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=99226931&ref=acom (accessed 9 May 2017).
